item.title: Texas GOP Platform Calls For Repealing Voting Rights Act Of 1965
item.description: Texas GOP Platform Calls For Repealing Voting Rights Act Of 1965 http://t.co/uHZcshBW
item.content:encoded: Texas GOP Platform Calls For Repealing Voting Rights Act Of 1965 http://t.co/uHZcshBW Texas GOP Platform Calls For Repealing Voting Rights Act Of 1965 | The Republican Party of Texas released its platform this month, calling on Congress to repeal the landmark Voting Rights Act of 1965. “We urge that the Voter [sic] Rights Act of 1965 codified and updated in 1973 be repealed and not reauthorized,” the platform reads. Texas is one of nine states with a history of racial discrimination that must get clearance from the Department of Justice before altering its voting Link - Trackbacks

item.title: 河北新報 東北のニュース／東電・勝俣会長、あすの株主総会で退任 事故後福島入りゼロ
item.description: [河北新報] 東電・勝俣会長、あすの株主総会で退任 事故後福島入りゼロ http://t.co/E195OtTm
item.content:encoded: [河北新報] 東電・勝俣会長、あすの株主総会で退任　事故後福島入りゼロ http://t.co/E195OtTm * 南相馬に仮設焼却炉　旧警戒区域、政府要請受け入れ（6/27 06:10） * 原発賠償、請求額は６０億円超　福島県見通し（6/27 06:10） * 福島県職員４人、東電に“天下り”　９４年以降（6/27 06:10） * 南相馬の小野田さん、コメづくり模索　山梨で試験作付け（6/27 06:10） * 置き去りの町は今　警戒区域　福島・双葉町（6/27 06:10） * 共産、次期衆院選・福島５区で吉田氏を公認候補として擁立（6/26 06:10） * アウトレット家具販売・まつもと、富谷町に代替店　７月開店（6/26 06:10） * 三菱電機、郡山工場を公開　震災で建て替え（6/26 06:10） * 試験操業で漁獲の相馬沖魚介類、店頭へ「待ちわびた」敬遠も（6/26 06:10） * 東電・勝俣会長、あすの株主総会で退任　事故後福島入りゼロ（6/26 06:10） Link - Trackbacks

item.content:encoded: Possible alien message to get reply from humanity: If there's something you'd like to say to aliens, now's your ... http://t.co/xa4c6IvP If there's something you'd like to say to aliens, now's your chance. item.description: Dems Forced to Downsize Once Again as Convention Fundraising Falls Short http://t.co/fK8djAMz via @sharethis Too bad, so sad!
item.content:encoded: Dems Forced to Downsize Once Again as Convention Fundraising Falls Short http://t.co/fK8djAMz via @sharethis Too bad, so sad! In January the DNC announced it would be downsizing its national convention from four days to three. Late Monday, the DNC announced another convention downsizing. The big kickoff event would be moved from the Speedway to downtown Charlotte. With Democrats unable to raise even one-third of their fundraising goal, they were forced to cut a few more corners off their already stunted convention. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: breitbart.com
